response.original_title: Soarin' Around the World | Disneyland Resort
response.overview: You're cleared for takeoff! Buckle up for a breathtaking Point of View flight over planet Earth in this aerial journey on Soarin' Around the World! From snowcapped mountains to sun-drenched savannahs, castles, oceans, and more! This cinematic adventure captures the sights, sounds, and sweeping beauty of our celestial home. Feel the wind rush past as you glide over landmarks, soar above skylines, and see the world as you've never seen them before... from the air! Part of the DisneylandÂ® Resort 70th Celebration, this ride-along invites you to rediscover our planet the way only Disney can show it. Nice work, pal, we hope you enjoy your flight.
response.tagline: Clear skies ahead! This Point of View film over our planet is magical. Presented by Coca-Cola.
response.title: Soarin' Around the World | Disneyland Resort
